name: Commercial Health Insurance
description: Employer-sponsored or individual health insurance offering medical coverage
covered_status: Covered entity if health plan under HIPAA definition

name: HMO Health Plan
description: Prepaid healthcare plan with network of providers and managed care requirements

name: PPO Health Plan
description: Health insurance plan with in-network and out-of-network provider options
covered_status: Covered entity if offers health insurance

name: POS Health Plan
description: Hybrid plan combining HMO and PPO features with primary care coordination

name: FEHBP
description: Health insurance program for federal government employees and retirees
covered_status: Covered entity (federal entity covered by HIPAA)

name: MA Plan
description: CMS health plan offering Medicare benefits through private insurers

name: Medigap Insurance
description: Supplemental insurance covering costs not covered by Medicare
covered_status: May be covered depending on health plan characteristics

name: Medicaid Health Plan
description: State and federally funded health insurance for low-income individuals

name: Workers Comp Plan
description: Insurance covering work-related injuries and occupational illnesses
covered_status: May be covered if meets health plan definition

name: Self-Insured Employee Plan
description: Employer-funded health plan administered by third party
covered_status: Covered entity if self-funded employer health plan
